title: Main railway line operations delayed due to technical issue
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Railways states that the operations along the main railway line have been delayed due to a train experiencing a technical issue in Kelaniya.
Deputy General Manager Gamini Seneviratne stated that an express train bound for Jaffna faced a technical fault near the Kelaniya Railway Station, which became the cause of the delay.
Seneviratne also stated that steps have been taken to restore the usual schedule along the main railway line.
Protestors at Armour St. construct makeshift tent opposite Police station
